entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of light snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
